18using System.Collections;
19using UnityEngine;
20using UnityEngine.SceneManagement;
21
25public class SelectScene : MonoBehaviour
26{
30 private bool buttonPressDisabled = false;
34 private float disableTime = 0.1f;
35
39 public string sceneName;
40
41 void Start()
42 {
43 Debug.Log(SceneManager.sceneCount);
44 }
45
50 void OnTriggerEnter(Collider other)
51 {
52 if (buttonPressDisabled) return;
53 buttonPressDisabled = true;
54 }
55
60 void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
61 {
62 if (!buttonPressDisabled) return;
63 executeAction();
64 StartCoroutine(EnableAfterSeconds());
65 }
66
71 IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds()
72 {
73 yield return new WaitForSeconds(disableTime);
74 buttonPressDisabled = false;
75 }
79 private void executeAction()
80 {
81 SceneManager.LoadScene(sceneName, LoadSceneMode.Single);
82 }
83}
84
SelectScene
This class is invoked on SceneSelection Button (VRUI-Carousel).

string sceneName
The name of the scene to load when this button is pressed.

IEnumerator EnableAfterSeconds()
Enables the button after a specified delay to mitigate button bounce effects.

void OnTriggerEnter(Collider other)
Called when a collider enters the trigger zone and disables the button to prevent bounce effects.

bool buttonPressDisabled
Variable stores if the button is currently disabled.

SelectScene.disableTime
float disableTime
Time the button is disabled after press to mitigate the bounce effect.

void OnTriggerExit(Collider other)
Called when a collider exits the trigger zone, it enables the button and loads the specified scene.

Loads the specified scene when the button is pressed.
